DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize control trial ( RCT ) compare adjuvanted influenza vaccine ( AV ) unadjuvanted inactivated influenza vaccine ( IIV ) . Children Hutterite colony Alberta Saskatchewan receive AV IIV . The goal study determine whether AV vaccine , provide increase community-wide protection .
DOC.brief_title: Adjuvanted Inactivated Vaccine Versus Inactivated Influenza Vaccine Hutterite Children
DOC.criteria: Group A : Receive Intervention Healthy child age 6 month 72 month Anaphylactic reaction previous dose influenza vaccine component Known Immunoglobulin E ( IgE ) mediate hypersensitivity egg manifest hive , swell mouth throat , difficulty breathing , hypotension , shock Guillain Barr√© syndrome within eight week previous influenza vaccine Use aspirin salicylate containing product within 30 day enrollment Group B : Household member child Group A
